aenya-Dail was a settlement of the avariel located somewhere within the Realms. It was one of the last remaining homes of the winged elves in existence as of the midâ€“14 century DR.
* Aerie, a resident of Faenya-Dail who was taken into slavery when she descended too far beneath her home while attempting to rescue an innocent child.
